Functions

bool surfit::_func_decomp (func *fnc)
 makes one wavelet-decomposition
bool surfit::_func_auto_decomp (func *fnc, REAL eps)
 calls _func_decomp() while difference between calc_approx_norm() are lower than eps

 makes one wavelet-reconstruction
bool surfit::_func_full_recons (func *fnc)
